query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alert_events (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant ENUM('launchbase','vinces') NOT NULL,
  alertKey VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('open','closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  meta JSON NULL,
  firstTriggeredAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  lastSentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  lastSeenAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  tenant ENUM('launchbase','vinces') NOT NULL,
  alertKey VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('open','closed') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open',
  title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT NOT NULL,
  meta JSON NULL,
  firstTriggeredAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  lastSentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  lastSeenAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
